data.title: great wings
data.text: we ordered takeout from the hotel and the wings were really good, the time for delivery did take awhile, however once they came they hit the spot.

data.title: Average
data.text: In the area and saw "wings".  I am always in the mood for some good wings, so I thought, "let's give this a try."  I have had better....I have had worse.  It was just average.

data.title: Good wings.  Terrible service.
data.text:
My wife and I have now visited twice.  Once with a group of friends, once just the two of us.  We had the same server on both visits.  Service was terrible.  We would ask for another round from the bar and 10 minutes later when she would walk by, we would ask about the drinks and she would admit that she forgot to put it in.  Not once, not twice, but three times in two visits.  The same for when we asked for refills on soft drinks, extra napkins, or refills on chips.  

The wings are very good.  Be careful.  The heat levels can get very intense.  On the second visit, my wife had a burger and really enjoyed it.  

If you can get a better server, you will enjoy your visit.

data.title: Good food
data.text: Visited the Johnson City TN location often when working there last year.  Took the family to this location while on vacation.  Food and service was great, portions a little smaller than I was use to.  Would visit again.   Need one in Asheville NC.

data.title: Average food but good service.
data.text: I ate here one night when staying in Mt. Pleasant on business.  I sat at the bar and the service was good.  The wings were fine but the fried chips were soggy.  Hey it's bar food so I don't expect a gourmet meal.  When staying at the Hampton Inn next door you don't have to drive or Uber. Bartender was cool and beer was cold.  Will check it our again when in town.

data.title: Lucky find!
data.text: We came across this restaurant on the way back to our hotel close by. I had the chicken sandwich, chicken was marinaded in their special wing sauce and was so tasty! My husband had an enormous beef burger that came with steak on top, salad and onion rings. Kids meals were generous and well priced. We got free drinks refills for kids and cold beers for us! Great family stop

data.title: Best Wings on the Planet
data.text:
We ordered the 25 sample platter. So delicious!!   Amazing taste and largest variety of wing flavors to choose from.  

Better than the other wing restaurant chains! 

Excellent service and fun atmosphere!

data.title: Really Good service and food
data.text: We were in town for College Of Charleston Orientation and stayed next door to East Coast. Walked across the parking lot for drinks and dinner and it was great. Bartender was friendly and mixed good drinks and food  was great. Try it if your in the area.

data.title: Take Out Please
data.text: My husband and I wanted to try this place however we were unable to go to the restaurant so we ordered takeout. Best wings we have had in a while! We got 25 wings, in flavors honey mustard, ranch, garlic parmesan, parmesan, and lemon pepper. Really liked all the flavors. Best part for me they were a dry rub which helped with the mess. Really looking forward to actually going there and trying more flavors.

data.title: Delicious wings
data.text: Friendly staff, tasty food, pleasing atmosphere, and reasonably priced.  I would definitely go back and recommend this place to others.  I think the wings are better here than in some places around the area.

data.title: Best wings on this planet
data.text: I have ate plenty of wings in my life time. These wings by far are the best wings I have ever had. My wife told me I make great wings at home but these wings put mine to shame. Hats off to East Coast Wings. Hope they open one in Summerville soon. Homemade mozzarella sticks were awesome too ! Highly recommend to any wing lover !!!

data.title: Might be my fault for showing up 25 minutes before closing.
data.text: Staff was far from friendly. Bartender really didn't want to take my order - even though host told me to go there. Sat and wiped glasses for 10 minutes with no one else at the bar, before taking my order. Wings were dry - overcooked, and the to-go order was given without the ordered bleu cheese.

data.title: poor food
data.text: these wings are the worst i have ever had. it was like they were from emaciated chickens and they were overcooked. i love chicken wings but i will never eat at this place again.

data.title: Best Chips In Town
data.text: Even though when they started a few years ago they had issues, Matt is really helping turn this location around. Food is so much better and beers are always cold. But the best thing about the food is the unlimited chips. Made perfectly every time and really good with HOT Sauce to dip it. WHEW!

data.title: First time and probably last
data.text: Took 5 minutes to be seated because no one was there to wait on us and it wasn't busy at all. Bottomless fries means two refills because they take forever to make. Our order wasn't taken until we were there for 25 minutes and our food wasnt ready till 60 minutes after we got there. Food was alright but the lowsy service and no offer to compensate us for our wasted time - I won't be going back and not recommending this to our friends.

data.title: Nice neighborhood pub
data.text: We were staying at the hotel next door and only tried the bar and had a friendly and enjoyable experience each visit.

owner_response.author: ECWG, Corporate Office at East Coast Wings & Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Awesome! We're so glad to hear you had a great experience with us. Make sure to come see us next time you're in the area!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Customer service with a friendly smile
data.text: It offered comfortable seating, very friendly staff, large menu,  has a separate bar area, American style food, burgers, wings etc reasonably price.  Put on your comfortable clothes and just chill.

owner_response.author: ECWG, Corporate Office at East Coast Wings & Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We're so glad to hear that you had a great experience. We can't wait to have you back!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Manager Dinner
data.text: I brought our Shift-Leader Team out for wings and we had a great time! Our waitress was a little forgetful and didn't seem to have her head in the game, but the other staff made up for the lapse. The specialty wings were delicious (as was the wrap and fries). I wish I could do a 4.5!! I will certainly be back!

data.title: Good solid food within walking distance
data.text: A tremendous selection of wing choices.  It took us a few minutes to digest(pun intended) them all to make a selection.  The basket of fries is incredible.

owner_response.author: East Coast Wing... a, Corporate Office at East Coast Wings & Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the feedback! We're so glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience. Come back and see us soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: It's ok
data.text: My grandson loves the wings. For me, they are just ok. The service is not that great either. I'll only go back when he wants to go.

owner_response.author: East Coast Wing... a, Owner at East Coast Wings & Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us some feedback. We'd be happy to hear any suggestions on how to make your experience better if you would like to email klindsey@eastcoastwings.com.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
